response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is valued at $1,500,000 to us due to its unique features, unparalleled quality, and the significant investment we've made in its development. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, potentially enhancing its prestige and functionality. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing of the product.", "product_price": 1500000}
